short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays motivation quotes on the new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You see your new tab page more often than any other site on the Internet. Motivate transforms your new tab page into a source of motivation, with inspiring quotes and beautiful landscapes.
